body: 5311 (return) [ Compare M. KlaprothÕs curious speculations on the Alani. He supposes them to have been the people, known by the Chinese, at the time of their first expeditions to the West, under the name of Yath-sai or A-lanna, the Alan‰n of Persian tradition, as preserved in Ferdusi; the same, according to Ammianus, with the Massaget¾, and with the Albani. The remains of the nation still exist in the Osset¾ of Mount Caucasus. Klaproth, Tableaux Historiques de lÕAsie, p. 174.ÑM. Compare Shafarik Slawische alterthŸmer, i. p. 350.ÑM. 1845.]
